snippet.title: BLINK - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
BLINK is a psychological horror story set in the 1970's, where threats lurk just beyond the blink of an eye. 

As the player, you assume the role of a babysitter watching over the daughter of the local psychiatrist, Dr. Vida. 

This demo is being developed by Abandoned House Studios and set to release this Fall. 

The music in the trailer was provided by ErikMMusic, and the song is, "The Midnight Hour." 
Check out him and his amazing music here: https://www.youtube.com/user/ErikMMusic/videos

Check out our website! https://www.abandonedhousestudios.com/

Follow us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/AbandonedHouseStudios/

Follow us on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/abandonedhousestudios/

Follow us on Twitter! https://twitter.com/AHStudiosGames
